content: Storage space amount is about to be exceeded: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a warning message when storage space is about to be exceeded. It shows the current and maximum storage values in a specific format. This message appears as a header in a UI component that displays quota information.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'حجم مساحة التخزين على وشك أن يتم تجاوزها' is a literal translation and a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be closer to 'مساحة التخزين على وشك التجاوز'.

The translation 'Yaddaş sahəsinin həcmi keçmək üzrədir' doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'Storage space amount is about to be exceeded'. A more accurate translation would emphasize the approaching limit, not just the action of exceeding it.
The colon after 'üzrədir' creates a slightly awkward phrasing. Removing it would improve flow.

The translation "Պահեստային տարածքի քանակը քիչ է մնում գերազանցվի" is a literal translation of 'Storage space amount is about to be exceeded' but sounds awkward and unnatural in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would convey the impending exceedance more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Պահեստային տարածքը մոտենում է սահմանափակիչ գիծին՝ {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}" (Storage space is approaching the limit: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}) or "Մնալ է տեղ մոտ՝ {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}" (Remaining space: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}). The best option depends on the overall tone of the UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "staat op het punt overschreden te worden" is grammatically awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "overschreden te worden" or "wordt overschreden".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: De hoeveelheid opslagruimte staat er op het punt te worden overschreden: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "A capacidade de armazenamento do espaço está prestes a ser excedida" is a bit literal and awkward. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'O espaço de armazenamento está prestes a ser excedido' or 'Sua capacidade de armazenamento está prestes a ser excedida'. The inclusion of 'do espaço' adds unnecessary words.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sua capacidade de armazenamento está prestes a ser excedida: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "ආචයනයේ ඉඩ ඉක්මවීමට ආසන්නයි: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}" is not a natural or accurate translation of "Storage space amount is about to be exceeded: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}". "ආචයනයේ" likely refers to 'organization' or 'institution' and doesn't fit the context of storage space. A more appropriate translation would focus on 'space' or 'capacity'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: හැලման ඉඩ ඉක්මවීමට ආසන්නයි: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}} or నిల్వ స్థలం ඉක්මවීමට ආසන්නයි: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically understandable, 'ආචයනයේ' is not a standard or readily understood word in this context. It appears to be a misinterpretation or incorrect transliteration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'ආචයනයේ' and replace with a more appropriate term relating to storage or capacity.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ц́е' is a non-standard contraction of 'ће'. The standard and preferred form is 'ће'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Количина меморијског простора ће ускоро бити прекорачена: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'memorijskog' is a slightly awkward construction. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Količina disk prostora će uskoro biti prekoračena: {{currentValue}} / {{maxValue}}
